name: Stealth Yeti - LD33
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 33: You are the monster

Stealth Yeti is a "stealth" game all about making a lot of noise, breaking stuff, and sneaking around at the same time.

The McCoy Cryptozoology Libraries have apparently captured most of the major cryptids around the world. As the yeti, sneak around and destroy their dangerous research to prevent further captures.

I worked on the art with dainryoo, so check out her tumblr! dainryoo.tumblr.com
